price: Nokorε sε, Nyamesurofoͻ no bɛnya Anigyeε Aheman no wͻ wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
